title: The smart way to buy a used phone online
description: Phones are becoming more and more expensive, and there isnt always a need to buy the newest phone available. Buying a used phone can be a great way to upgrade and save a lot of money at the same time. In this episode of Workflow, Becca shows us how she shops for used phones and what sites to use for a great deal.
